name: Castle Defender (itch) (Vicot)
description:
The game is a prototype. Due to time constraints a lot of stuff is still missing in this release.

Orcs are attacking your kingdom and stealing all the gold. Set up defences with what you have left to protect the royal treasury and take back what's yours!

Game is lost when you run out of gold. Overspending on defences also counts!

Game is won if you collect over 4000 gold.

Controls:

Pan camera with middle mouse or moving the mouse to the screen edge.

1/2/3 - Shortcut to select buildings from build menu

Q/W - Shortcut to select abilities from ability menu

Left mouse - Select towers (to upgrade or repair) and place towers or use abilities

Right mouse - cancel current action
